scripts.prepare-mainnet: mustache ./config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.prepare-polygon: mustache ./config/polygon.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && npm run codegen
scripts.deploy-mainnet: npm run prepare-mainnet && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ nelsongaldeman/simplefi-1inch-mainnet
scripts.deploy-polygon: npm run prepare-polygon && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ simplefi-finance/simplefi-1inch-polygon
